sentences.sentence: He had an unshakable premonition that he would die.
sentences.translation: 他有一种强烈的预感：他就要死了。

sentences.sentence: He had a premonition that he would never see her again.
sentences.translation: 他有一种将再也见不到她的预感。

sentences.sentence: I bet $20 on a horse called Premonition.
sentences.translation: 我在那匹名叫“预言”的赛马身上下了$20的赌注。
